text:
thredUP - San Francisco (Downtown)

thredUP.com is the world's largest online consignment store.

We're really in need of a senior Ruby/Rails developer, but we're open to entry and junior Ruby/Rails developers as well.

More information here: http://labs.thredup.com/dear-experienced-ruby-dev-come-join-...

E-mail dan@thredup.com and we'll get some coffee and chat!
